extendedInfo.description: You have been tasked with upholding order in your own pocket sized aquarium. You must keep your fish from starving and protect them from the tank-invading sea monsters. If you're lucky - your fish will drop coins for you to collect and spend on strategic upgrades to improve your own tank eco-system! If that's not keeping you busy enough, head on over to the store and spend your pearls on customizing your aquarium with attractive artifacts ranging from treasure boxes and skulls to windmills and castles!. 10 exciting and fun-filled levels for you to explore.  Absolutely free entertainment for the first 5 levels.  Simple and interactive interface.  Colorful and vivid graphics. Including a HD version!.  Kid-friendly and suitable for all ages.  Practice session to help you learn and play even better.  The most exciting fish aquarium & strategy based online game yet!Donât forget to rate the game if you love it! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Tags: Tap Fish, tapfish, Tap a Fish, fish aquarium, aquarium, fish, fishes, fish tank, tap fish game, tap fish seasons, tap fish for android, fish farm, tap fish breeding, download tap fish for android

reviews.title: Nice game great graphics
reviews.comment: It\'s a game with great graphics and good tactics.developers sud add a tutorial in the beginning nd explain how fishes behave.sud have some more free stages :-P
reviews.author: Saurabh Mimani

reviews.title: kinda fun
reviews.comment: It realy remind me of this flash based game thats exact like this,but you keep youre pets and upgrades and it was more cartoony.. This have a lovely graphic,challenging gameplay,yet I do wish you could keep some of the pets you bought allready -_-
reviews.author: Michy J

reviews.title: Just wow
reviews.comment: My friend recommended this to me and i have to say it was a good pick. It takes some time to reach to full action but once it is there you are totally occupied.
reviews.author: Ritesh Lackhman

reviews.title: 5 Star is ok.
reviews.comment: Great!!very nice.I am happy,some times is hard,but es funny.
reviews.author: Alicia Gallardo

reviews.title: Great fish game
reviews.comment: I have been playing this since yesterday and have to say it is best fish game i have found here. There are lots of things to do and lots of well crafted characters. Real fun starts from fourth level.
reviews.author: Katherine Johnes

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Totally different from all the fish farm games out there. It is real fast, filled with lots of actions. Characters are cute and design is top notch. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Rachel Cook

reviews.title: Tight ....
reviews.comment: Awsome art and colors..very well done work...best fish n aquarium game onboard...aliens are cool n a bit of funny too...great imagination guys, the way u created d characters just awsome....for guys who wanna play some tight game this one is bedt in business. ..
reviews.author: neeraj bharadwaj

reviews.title: Tap to kill aliens
reviews.comment: Love this game. It slowly gets fast but then keeps me engrossed completely. Kill aliens, feed fish, feed carnivores, collect diamonds.... For a single second you can\'t take your eyes off. Great fun.
reviews.author: George Davis

reviews.title: Good time pass
reviews.comment: Great game...waiting for more levels
reviews.author: Kelly Wills

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I have enjoyed playing this game. It becomes more interesting after third level, will be more helpful if you buy pets for fighting with two monsters and zombies at the same time.
reviews.author: Maria Simmons

reviews.title: magnificence materialized in app form
reviews.comment: This game arouses all six senses of a human being. It is the quintessence of a jolly aquatic adventure.
reviews.author: John Gu

reviews.title: Bravo!!!
reviews.comment: Best game i hav ever played.. i hav like 30 games on my S3 but i play this the most. its really fun to kill aliens and collect coin...i nvr thought that a fish game could be so much fun...Would recommend this to all of my frnds n family member...Hats off to developers for this wonderful fish game
reviews.author: Andrew Watson

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Its a great game with lots of cute fish..its cool how you fight with aliens to save your cute n innocent fish..:)..a great fun game for fish lovers..very addictive!
reviews.author: Shane Clarke

reviews.title: I am in love with tap a fish
reviews.comment: It\'a easy to use rather addictive.   Adorable, fun, relaxing and cute graphics. Overall great fun.
reviews.author: Montu Yadav

reviews.title: Confusing...
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t make any sense...why is their a quest to get Ruby\'s but there\'s NO option for it?!?!?! Was really fun for a bit but unfortunately I uninstalled....
reviews.author: Kristal Janousek

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: I am literally addicted to this game..it is jst so much fun..you guys are awesome!
reviews.author: Samantha Bruce

reviews.title: Update on review...
reviews.comment: First gave 5 but with each level completed I have to buy my pets over again! Very irritating & what\'s the point of completing a level? Fix it & my rating will improve.
reviews.author: M Hayes

reviews.title: Wow....
reviews.comment: Plzzz open other levels as welll
reviews.author: Mahima Neil

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome graphics, layout and excellent logics of game.
reviews.author: Virendra Tiwari

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Nice game
reviews.author: sarita surana
